mapper.update: update User set active=false where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select U.user_id, U.user_name, U.user_pwd, U.user_sex, U.user_phone, U.create_time, U.active, U.user_state, R.role_id "role.role_id", R.symbol "role.symbol", R.description "role.description" from User U inner join role R on R.role_id = U.role_id where U.user_id=#{userId} and U.active=true

select U.user_id as user_id, U.user_name as user_name, U.user_pwd as user_pwd, U.user_sex as user_sex, U.user_phone as user_phone, U.create_time as create_time, U.active as active, U.user_state as user_state, R.role_id as role_id, R.symbol as symbol, R.description as description from User U inner join role R on R.role_id=U.role_id where U.active=true

select U.user_id, U.user_name, U.user_pwd, U.user_sex, U.user_phone, U.create_time, U.active, U.user_state, R.role_id "role.role_id", R.symbol "role.symbol", R.description "role.description" from User U inner join role R on R.role_id = U.role_id where U.user_name=#{userName} and U.active=true

select U.user_id, U.user_name, U.user_pwd, U.user_sex, U.user_phone, U.create_time, U.active, U.user_state, R.role_id "role.role_id", R.symbol "role.symbol", R.description "role.description" from User U inner join role R on R.role_id = U.role_id where U.active=true and U.user_state=1 and U.user_name=#{userName} and U.user_pwd=#{password}
